dialog.astrbot.no_module: There is no module installed in this slot!
dialog.astrbot.terminal.title: Terminal Control Panel
item.astrbot.active_defence_system.lore: Intercept projectiles that may be heading your way!
item.astrbot.negative_effect_generator.l: Inflicts 10 seconds of slowness and weakness on undead mobs, arthropod
mobs, and raid participants within 20 blocks of the surrounding area,
item.astrbot.sonic_boom_transmitter.lore: Make your drone emit sound waves like a guardian
item.astrbot.solar_energy.lore: Convert solar energy into energy for machine operation
item.astrbot.backpack.lore: Organizes and stores your belongings in neat order.

tips.astrbot.createtable.create_bot: Press '%s+%s' to retrieve the assembled automaton
tips.astrbot.createtable.heavy_bot_only: This module may only be installed on heavy bots!
tips.astrbot.createtable.attack_slot_onl: Attack modules must be installed exclusively in the central armament slots.
tips.astrbot.createtable.too_many_module: The maximum number of installations for this module has been reached!
